keyFacts: The document details account balances for Jeffrey Epstein's account at Deutsche Bank for September 2018.
The beginning balance on September 1, 2018, was $1,000.00.
There were no deposits made during the month, and the ending balance remained $1,000.00.
Service charges and fees totaled $50.00 for the month.
The document includes instructions for reporting errors or inquiries regarding the account.
